codetags.custom.name: CAVEAT
codetags.custom.body: Implementation details/gotchas that stand out as non-intuitive.

codetags.custom.name: SEE
codetags.custom.body: Pointers to other code, web link, etc.

codetags.custom.name: RFE
codetags.custom.body: Requests For Enhancement: Roadmap items not yet implemented.

codetags.custom.name: REQ
codetags.custom.body: Requirements: Satisfactions of specific, formal requirements.

codetags.custom.name: HACK
codetags.custom.body: Temporary code to force inflexible functionality, or simply a test change, or workaround a known problem.

codetags.custom.name: NOBUG
codetags.custom.body: Will Not Be Fixed: Problems that are well-known but will never be addressed due to design problems or domain limitations.
